content: Perfect, that looks like the thing I was searching for! Thank you very much! @Joshua Nelson
xFrednet has marked this topic as resolved.
fwiw I found this by going to https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ty/context/struct.TyCtxt.html and searching default_span from the error message
Ahh, I was mostly looking at the code windows. Reading the actual message is a good tip :)
